card_text: If you control an Illusion or Spellcaster monster: Activate 1 of these effects;$N●Your Illusion and Spellcaster monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.$N●During your opponent's turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.$N●When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, except the attacking monster; change the attack target to it and perform damage calculation.
